title: WATCH: A debate over ballot Question 1, which would increase taxes for state's highest earners
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Question 1 on the November ballot proposes changing the state's constitution to add a 4% surtax on any income that exceeds $1 million.
itunes:author: WBUR

itunes:summary: Question 1 on the November ballot proposes changing the state's constitution to add a 4% surtax on any income that exceeds $1 million.

media:content.media:description: A portion of the 1040 U.S. Individual Income Tax Return form. (Mark Lennihan/AP)

content:encoded: Question 1 on the November ballot proposes changing the state's constitution to add a 4% surtax on any income that exceeds $1 million.
